title: Anno.2070.Update.1.01-RELOADED
description:
Anno 2070 (c) Ubisoft

11/2011 :..... RELEASE.DATE .. PROTECTION .......: SS2/Crap
1 :.......... DISC(S) .. GAME.TYPE ........: Strategy

Our original crack was for the 1.01 update of the game, but we neglected to
include the update itself in our previous iso. Here is the update with the
crack

1. Unrar
2. Install the update.
3. Copy over the cracked content from the /Crack dir to your install dir.
Then either run install.bat or copy the "Profile" dir to
%appdata%UbisoftANNO 2070" manually
4. Block the game exes in your system firewall
5. Play the game. When prompted, use "RELOADED" as login and "1" as password
to play the game offline

PS: "Return to C.O.R.E." included
